name: Beyond Eden (itch)
description:
Game requires to be in FULLSCREEN.

~ This game has multiple endings ~ 

(Do remember, you can go up the street in the yellow city)

Set in the modern day, but where history has not gone so well as it has done for us, the player is met with various choices for him to reach a rumoured utopia. All the while, a mysterious narrator tries to guide him there. 

Controls: 

  • Movement - WASD
  • Interact - Mouse + SPACE bar

Notes:

  • Turn on audio to hear the narrator
  • If you are having bugs/issues - try downloading the file for Windows.

Known Issures:

  • Music/Audio is sometimes too loud.
